mapper.select:
select cc.* from ( select c.clSeq ,c.clType ,c.clTitle ,c.clDec ,c.clDateTimeReg ,c.clDateTimeEdit ,c.clSituation ,c.clDateTimeTre ,c.clDateTimeTreEnd ,c.clDateTimePay ,c.clPayOut ,c.clPayMethod ,c.clUseNY ,c.clDelNY ,c.claimManage_clmSeq ,c.customer_cmSeq ,a.cmSeq ,a.cmName ,b.clmSeq ,b.clmSituation
Order By c.clSeq desc ) cc limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

select c.clSeq ,c.clType ,c.clTitle ,c.clDec ,c.clDateTimeReg ,c.clDateTimeEdit ,c.clSituation ,c.clDateTimeTre ,c.clDateTimeTreEnd ,c.clDateTimePay ,c.clPayOut ,c.clPayMethod ,c.clUseNY ,c.clDelNY ,c.claimManage_clmSeq ,c.customer_cmSeq from claim c where 1 =1 and c.clSeq = #{clSeq}
select a.cmSeq ,a.cmName from customer a where 1=1 and a.cmDelNy = 0
select b.clmSeq ,b.clmSituation from claimManage b where 1=1 and b.clmDelNy = 0
mapper.update: update claim set clDelNY = 1 where 1 = 1 and clSeq = #{clSeq}
